name: Vegan One Pot Pasta with Spinach and Tomatoes
description: This vegan one pot pasta with spinach and tomatoes is super easy to make, incredibly healthy, packed with flavor, and SO delicious!! It's one of my favorite meals for busy weeknights.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons red curry paste ((make sure it's vegan))
1 cup canned full fat coconut milk

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 2-3 minutes. Then add the garlic and cook for one more minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the remaining ingredients except for the fresh spinach and cherry tomatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for about 13 minutes, then add the cherry tomatoes and the spinach and cook for two more minutes. Season with salt and black pepper. Enjoy!
